description:
A personal injury can happen in an instance, but it can change your life forever. When another party's negligence causes you harm, the Louisville, Kentucky, law office of McCoy, Hiestand & Smith, PLC, deploys the full breadth of its resources to advocate for your rights and the maximum amount of compensation. Though our combined decades of experience do not hurt, we believe that it is our passion for justice and commitment to helping individuals in need that enable us to secure the best possible outcomes for injured persons and their families.

Due to the complexity of personal injury cases and the life-shattering nature of the injuries themselves, we maintain an exclusively personal injury focus. As a result, our law office has the talent and resources necessary to go up against some of the largest corporations and insurers in some of the most complex cases to grace the court system. While harm can arise out of any everyday instance, we commonly represent individuals in the following matters:

• Car accidents
• Trucking accidents
• Animal bites
• Construction accidents
• Medical malpractice
• Birth injuries
• Brain injuries
• Nursing home abuse
• Assault and battery - plaintiff
• Bad faith insurance
• Aviation and mass transit accidents
• Drugs and medical device injuries
• Civil rights suits
• Disability claims
• Class actions
• Products liability
• Premises liability
• Wrongful death

The law office of McCoy, Hiestand & Smith, PLC, does not shy away from litigation. We prepare from day one to go to trial, which we will discuss with you during your free initial consultation. When we take on a case, we dedicate our full attention to it. We encourage you to reach out to us any time you have a question or concern and to not hesitate to schedule an in-person or virtual appointment.
